name: Health Check
description: We offer whole body health checkup packages in Bangladesh which includes cardiac consult, eye, ENT & dental consults, pulmonary function test etc.

name: Operation Theater
description: We offer extensive medical procedures to outbound & inbound patients what it is and we are very proud achievement staff.

name: Pharmacy Support
description: We have awesome pharmacy support. Here all drugs are always availble with discount. Surgical equibment also available in our pharmacy.

name: Ambulance Car
description: Our hostipals have own ambulance sercvice. We are providing ambulance services at low cost. Call us for booking ambulance.

name: Intensive Care
description: We have 50 intensive care unit. Please call us for booking. We also have 30 CCU with 24 hours doctor services. ICU are we managed and used modern technology.

name: Lab Tests
description: We offer all medical tests which report we provide in short time. We use modern technology in ou lab. Our lab is conducted by some inteligents medical students.
